challenges.title: What is the best definition of cyberbullying?

challengeOptions.text: Cyberbullying is when someone uses technology to be mean to another person. This includes things like sending hurtful messages, spreading rumors online, or posting embarrassing photos.
Cyberbullying is when someone posts a funny meme online. Even if it's meant to be funny, it can still hurt someone's feelings.
Cyberbullying is when someone plays a video game and loses. It's just a game, so it's not a big deal..
